UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and antibiofilm activity of the EeCentrocin 1 derived peptide EC1-17KV via membrane disruption.
Literature.Author: Ma L, Ye XY, Xu P, Wang L, Liu Z, Huang X, Bai Z, Zhou C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human gastric epithelial cells GES-1:IC50=350 µg/ml,Human hepatocyte cells HL-7702 (L02):IC50=450 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=256µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=128-256µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=64-256µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MBC=32µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=64µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CMCC 10104(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=128µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=128µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=16-32µg/ml),Candida albicans(MFC=32-128µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 28957(MIC=32µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=16-32µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MFC=16-32µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=250µg/ml)
